title: Online Co-Learning Strategy Based on Multi-Branch Multi-Scale Network for 12-Lead ECG Classification
details: S Han, C Ma, Z Wang, Y Hou, J Li, C Liu - IEEE Transactions on Instrumentation and …, 2024
abstract: The coexistence of multiple cardiovascular diseases (CVDs) will increase the burden on cardiac function and increase the patient's risk of death. The 12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG) offers a more comprehensive assessment of cardiac …
